###### PACKAGES

import numpy  as np 
import pandas as pd
source.9d97183a:
##### IMPORT DATA

train = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/adams2021/train.csv')
test  = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/adams2021/test.csv')
print(train.shape, test.shape)
source.37cfbe21:
##### COMPUTE MEAN PRICE

mean_price = train['price'].mean()
mean_price
source.b89f91ed:
##### PRODUCE NAIVE SUBMISSION

test['price'] = mean_price
submission    = test[['listing_id', 'price']]

submission.to_csv('sample_submission.csv', index = False)
